title: Was Elehan Omar an American citizen more than the First Lady Melanie Trump?
subtitle: Jake Taber LCNN added an interesting point of view to the debate about the oral attack by President Donald Trump on "The Women of Congress Progressive Democracies" in July 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Elehan Omar became a naturalized American citizen before the First Lady (Melania Trump) did.
